tool_description: Verifies transaction compliance with regulatory requirements including AML, KYC, and regional payment regulations.

transaction_amount.description: Transaction amount for compliance threshold checking

merchant_country.description: Merchant country code for regulatory compliance

customer_country.description: Customer country code for cross-border compliance

transaction_type.description: Type of transaction (purchase, refund, transfer, subscription)

error_messages: AML threshold exceeded: Transaction exceeds anti-money laundering reporting threshold
Sanctioned entity: Customer or merchant appears on sanctions list
Insufficient KYC: Customer verification level insufficient for transaction amount
Restricted country: Transaction not permitted between specified countries
Invalid transaction type: Transaction type not supported for compliance check
Business category restricted: Merchant business category has compliance restrictions
usage: Provide transaction details including amounts, parties, countries, and transaction type. The tool checks against relevant compliance requirements and returns status with any required actions.

violated_regulations.description: List of regulations that may be violated
